Description:
As an Internal Auditor, you will play a crucial role in evaluating and enhancing our internal controls, risk management, and governance processes. You will be responsible for conducting comprehensive audits and assessments of various departments and business units within the organization. Your key responsibilities will include:Conducting independent and objective evaluations of financial and operational processes.
Identifying areas of potential risk and recommending improvements to existing controls.
Verifying the accuracy and integrity of financial records and compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
Preparing detailed audit reports outlining findings and recommendations for management review.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement audit recommendations and monitor progress.
Staying up-to-date with industry standards, best practices, and regulatory changes to ensure effective audits.Skills
Skills:
Saudi Nationality
Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
At least 3 years of proven experience as an Internal Auditor, preferably in the FMCG industry.
